column3: “My favorite strain!! I'm a heavy stoner and let me tell you it was fire af 🔥🔥”

“The only bad thing about this strain is now after having experiencing this wonderful strain I feel like a lot of other strains in general are ruined for me. I continually bought this until they ran out. If you ever cross it in your travels you have to buy it. The smell of this bud alone gives you the munchies. It smells delicious and tastes even better. I got mine testing at 25.57 thc. This is truly one hell of a str...”
“it has quickly become one of my favorite strains. i cannot begin to describe how good it is. try it if you get a chance, you won't regret it.”
“The Captain wont weigh you down. Uplifting with some buttery tastes.”
“Very earthy, with a major uplifted feeling.”
“this was fire..if u have the legit strain.   some good ass buds”
“I had this strain once long ago and now I can't find it. If anyone knows a medi in the Los Angeles area please post the name in a review”
“One of my first highs ever. I've always been a fan”

“The Captain" has a lot going for it. Nice balance of body soothing and pain killing with an overall euphoric feeling. There was a nice amount of cerebral stimulation that brought about some deep thinking
column4: left me feeling like I was laying on a marshmellow. Very tasty and smooth flower
column5: little bit sweet an the smoke wasnt too heavy. Overall a very relaxing strain that combats stress and pain.”"

column3: “This was the very first strain I smoked. I felt so good, and my anxiety disappeared immediately. This is one of my favorites. I only smoke it on special occasions. It's definitely worth a try.”
“Damn. Name’s of strains get me and how could I resist this one? This strain is fun! Keeps me creative and bright. Puts me in a great mood.”

“Best strain ever, I don't feel it from anywhere to 5-10 min but then all of a sudden it feels like you get hit my captain americas shield and you get such a head and body high. It's unbelievable, absolutely my favorite.”
“I love it. It's really smooth, it's a little sweet and always have me feeling very relaxed and happy. Also I can still get things done and go out.”

“Captain America is in fact legit. Doesn't come around often but when it does, let that Captain into your life. Smells like an open spread at a wedding, with all your favourite foods. You can feel the high in your teeth at first as it penetrates your skeleton and slowly morphs you into a superhero. You will have pure energy flowing through your veins yet be in complete control like a ninja. Enjoy.”
